ExperienceSummary.Description: ~~~~~~~~~   is experienced in the management of:  Information Technology (Project Management); and Marketing.    ~~~~~~~~~   has 23 years of work experience, with 22 years of management experience, including a high-level position.
ExperienceSummary.ManagementStory:
Starting on 9/1/2018, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 9 months:
	Title: Programme Director for Polymax
Starting on 6/1/2017, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 15 months:
	Title: SaaS Marketing Strategy Lead for simpleshow GmbH
Starting on 9/1/2009, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 6 years and 5 months:
	Title: Associate Director - Global Programme Management Office / Relationship Management for ReSources Business Services (Publicis Groupe), UK & USA, Publicis Groupe
Starting on 4/1/2007, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 2 years and 3 months:
	Title: Supervisor for ReSources Business Services (Publicis Groupe), UK & USA, Relay Worldwide (Publicis Groupe)
Starting on 1/1/2004, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 3 years and 3 months:
	Title: Marketing Services Manager for Ad-Fax Inc
Starting on 10/1/2002, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 15 months:
	Title: Business Development Manager for Polymax UK
Starting on 7/1/1998, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 2 years and 5 months:
	Title: Director & Founder for Shopons Direct Marketing
Starting on 12/1/1996, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 19 months:
	Title: Senior Marketing & Sales Manager for Xerox & Compaq
Starting on 5/1/1994, the candidate held the following executive-level management position for 2 years and 7 months:
	Title: Senior Marking Executive for Trigyn Technologies
ExperienceSummary.AttentionNeeded: ATTENTION: The candidate appears to have been in management in a past role (Programme Director for Polymax), but was not in management in the most recent role as Programme Consultant for 3RDi.

Positions.Description:
Responsible for complete organisational PMO project controls setup and new software delivery
management, closely aligning with the core operational strategy. Scope of work includes, growth & business
development planning, Agile project management practice setup, communications and data management
tool selection & deployment and supervision of regulatory compliance across all operations.

Responsible for providing consultancy services on an RPA democratisation & P2P automation programme.
Oversaw project deploying a Citizen Developer RPA platform across Ericsson globally, directly accountable for
all gamification and digital marketing aspects. Led organisational change management strategy and activities.
Key contributions and successes:
•   Top-level engagement with global heads at up to C-Suite level on programme progress and delivery
•   Introduced & embedded daily Agile project management practices, transitioning away from Waterfall
•   Led end-to-end development and launch of digital interfaces for platform, enhancing platform reach
•   Managed internal shared budget of €1.5m, with programme reaching global employee base of 70k+
•   Oversaw team of SharePoint Portal developers and UX designers for website and Botstore delivery
•   Ensured project adherence to legal & ethical parameters, as well as global data & storage regulation
•   Collaborated with HR team to develop a change plan to mitigate the impact of work culture changes
•   Consulted on project overseeing Finance Procure-to-Pay process automation with Cognitive Agents
•   Delivered 20+ training sessions to re-train European Automations team staff on Agile methodology


1

Responsible for all aspects of programme leadership and delivery, spearheading the transformation strategy and ERP implementation for Polymax UK. Engaged collaboratively with senior-level business stakeholders.
Led an organisational restructuring project through the deployment of an eCommerce platform (cloud ERP and CRM solutions), further enhancing with a CRM tool to increase sales and operational sync capabilities across three global locations. Achieved targeted annual efficiencies of in excess of £1.5m, realising benefits.

Responsible for developing business and providing global marketing expertise across multiple clients.
Launched €15m B2B SaaS platform offering, collaborating with the global marketing strategy team to conduct customer lifecycle management analysis.
Key contributions and successes:
•   Led competitive landscape analysis, provided design updates and service improvement insights
•   Directed digital marketing initiatives through channels including social, programmatic & analytics
•   Supported promotional activities of core business offering including direct sales efforts to clients
•   Instrumental in product roadmap development, collaborating with sales and development teams
•   Defined technology strategy & contributed to product innovation processes, leveraging feedback

JobTitle.Raw: Associate Director - Global Programme Management Office / Relationship Management
JobTitle.Normalized: Associate Director Global Programme Management Office Relationship Management

Positions.JobLevel: Senior Manager (more than 5 years management experience)
Positions.Description:
Sep 2009 to Jan 2016
Associate Director - Global Programme Management Office / Relationship Management
Responsible for engaging on a portfolio of business-critical transformation programmes for clients, effectively
managing PMO and relationship management activities.
Oversaw execution of $200m global organisation restructuring project and integrated process transformation,
including implementing a data-driven technology strategy and delivering multiple digital platform upgrades.
Key contributions and successes:
•   Delivered on a $20m initiative to convert operating platform of 17k+ users onto a unified SSO stack
•   Reduced staff attrition rates by 30% via use of a new $400k smart applicant profiling system solution
•   Integrated IT services of 8 newly-acquired businesses onto group TOM, cumulative impact of $12m+
•   Led migration of enterprise app stacks to digital platforms, including key tools such as CLM & CRM
•   Deployed    ~~   cloud platform and Adobe Cloud for 10+ agency brands with user base of 15,000
•   Oversaw RFP, vendor selection and contract negotiations to implement a robust $2m RPA solution
•   Ensured agency adherence to regulations such as SOX, CSR and Safe Harbour, supporting audits
•   Assessed operational compliance & established HIPAA compliant private cloud data hosting solution
•   Designed and implemented communications framework to deliver dashboards reaching 65k+ users
•   Managed delivery of digital assets for client campaign, designing and deploying eCommerce website

Responsible for end-to-end management of research project lifecycles, implementing innovative solutions.
Engaged on a $1m programme to upgrade and digitise the data collection platform, enabling higher security and connectivity.
Key contributions and successes:
•   Realised annual savings of $300k+ via digital initiatives within field operations, migrating to the cloud
•   Migrated field force technology platform from Lotus Notes to Google, achieving 5% cost reduction
•   Replaced a legacy communications tech platform, saving 40% in costs and improving performance
•   Managed complete project cycle from survey development, programming, analysis and reporting
•   Provided leadership to a regional team of marketing, innovation, IT and field services employees
•   Led acquisition, contracting and development of market-leading innovate marketing technologies


2
•   Oversaw an experiential marketing campaigns, defining success criteria & analysing post-execution

Responsible for developing marketing campaigns based on demographic & market segmentation research.
Advised local government on a $25m Muni-WiFi initiative, impacting 4 major towns across Northern Iowa,
supervising research, project planning and community canvassing campaigns to secure stakeholder buy-in.


Key contributions and successes:
•   Designed & implemented a national branding & pricing strategy for McKenna ProPhoto Image Labs
•   Managed team of media buyers, creatives & research analysts to develop robust marketing strategy
•   Developed strategy for Midwest US business houses, generating new business revenue of $750k
•   Built strategic partnerships with outsourced web designers & vendors, increasing project profitability

Responsible for developing an innovative new market entry plan and establishing sales operations for the US region, consulting on global online strategies and spearheading strategic business development activity.


Early Career

Taxonomies.Name: Call Center or Help Desk or Customer Service

Achievements: Kauffman Entrepreneurial Scholarship Award	Award Recipient
Xerox, India	Winner of two Excellence in Sales Awards
UK Citizen	Excellent references available	Flexible on location for the right opportunity
QualificationsSummary:
Areas of Expertise
E2E Programme Delivery	Transformation Programmes	Strategic Partnerships
Stakeholder Engagement	Modern Workplace Design	Customer Relationships

Findings.Message: You should not use the PDF format for your resume. Due to inherent limitations with text extraction from PDFs, you are less likely to get a job when using a PDF resume.
A street level address was not found in the contact information. A full contact address should always be included in a resume as it allows for location based searches.
Every degree in a resume should be associated with a school.

The following section was identified as a skills section type: 'Areas of Expertise'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education. THIS IS INCREDIBLY IMPORTANT FOR AI MATCHING ALGORITHMS

ResumeMetadata.PlainText:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~  
London, UK |    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~   |    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~   |
   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  /


Senior Programme Manager / Programme Director
Extensive enterprise marketing, business development & programme delivery experience
Enterprising, innovative and commercially-astute, with 20+ years of experience in leading the delivery of
innovative technology solutions across B2B, marketing, technology, consulting and global corporate sectors.
PRINCE2, Agile & Waterfall-trained, able to pragmatically apply structured methodologies & best practice.
Collaborative approach to transformational leadership, engaging with key stakeholders at up to C-level,
leading marketing initiatives, business development and programme delivery, aligned to business needs.
Expertise in transformative technology implementation, including delivery of AI, ML and Cloud solutions.
Global team leadership experience, managing teams across Asia, North America and European marketing
with a 'hands-on' approach to client engagement. Leverages an 'open' leadership and management style.
Champions business change, end-to-end programme delivery, organisational transformation, digital
innovation, ERP and CRM solutions, P2P processes, eCommerce and the realisation of business benefits.

Areas of Expertise
E2E Programme Delivery	Transformation Programmes	Strategic Partnerships
Stakeholder Engagement	Modern Workplace Design	Customer Relationships
Business Benefits Realisation	Digital Solutions, EUC	Contract Negotiations
Change Management	CRM, SAP, ERP, SharePoint	Communications Planning
Agile, Waterfall, Prince2	SaaS / Cloud Implementation	Team Leadership & Motivation
